title: Bind emotes to abilities
body:
I posted it on another section, but i want a definite answer and I didn't get one. Is binding emotes (not mastery emote, just normal emotes like the Clean emote) to your QWERD and F allowed so every time you use an ability you use the emote allowed? If it is, how do I do it in a safe way that can't get me hacked in the process?

Sorry if it's too much to ask for for you to answer this but thank you either way. {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
